Package org.apache.commons.lang3.function

Interface FailableToIntBiFunction<T,​U,​E extends Throwable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the first argument to the function
    U - the type of the second argument to the function
    E - The kind of thrown exception or error.
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface FailableToIntBiFunction<T,​U,​E extends Throwable>
    A functional interface like ToIntBiFunction that declares a Throwable.
    Since:
    3.11
